title: Verify web UI implementation against design canon
description: Canon Audit finding (Principle 8: Thorough). The conceptual framework is polished but execution details need verification. Audit: (1) Pure black canvas adherence, (2) Typography scale with clamp(), (3) Golden ratio spacing, (4) Error states and breakdown handling, (5) Edge cases - single integration, dismissed suggestions, silent failures.
close_reason: Audit complete. Fixed: (1) Body background #111111→#000000, (2) Theme-color #161616→#000000. Verified: Typography with clamp(), golden ratio spacing, error states with local handling. Noted: workflows.tsx uses silent failures for progressive enhancement.

title: Evaluate GAS TOWN integration strategy
close_reason: Evaluation complete. Documented in docs/GASTOWN_EVALUATION.md. Recommendation: Merge Concepts strategy with 3-phase TypeScript implementation. Commit: e2c3b7b

title: Implement 'workway workflow install' command
description: Add 'workway workflow install <workflow-id>' command to install workflows from marketplace. Should fetch workflow metadata, download source files, configure credentials, and set up local test data. High user value - the most requested missing CLI feature.

title: Create investor translation layer for Heideggerian concepts
description: Canon Audit finding (Principle 4: Understandable). The Heideggerian language is intellectually coherent but creates communication risk for investors. 'Zuhandenheit' doesn't translate to a pitch deck. Create executive summary versions that preserve insight without jargon. Examples: 'Tool recession' → 'invisible automation', 'Vorhandenheit' → 'when things break'.

Add Course schema to each learning path
Access token expires in 1 hour, refresh token in 7 days
private-workflows: Show visibility: 'private' pattern, access grants
Show "No progress yet" for new users
Integration template doesn't extend BaseAPIClient (violates DRY)

BLOCKER: Implement Stripe Elements checkout UI
description:
Critical checkout blocker discovered during Stripe verification.

PROBLEM:
- Backend creates payment intents and returns clientSecret when installing paid integrations
- Frontend has NO Stripe Elements integration - cannot collect card details
- Result: Users cannot complete payment flow

BACKEND STATUS (Complete):
- apps/api/src/lib/stripe.ts - Payment intent creation ✓
- apps/api/src/routes/installations.ts - Returns clientSecret for paid installs ✓
- apps/api/src/routes/webhooks.ts - Handles payment success/failure ✓

FRONTEND STATUS (Missing):
- No @stripe/stripe-js or @stripe/react-stripe-js packages
- No PaymentElement component
- No checkout modal/page

FIX REQUIRED:
1. Add Stripe packages: pnpm add @stripe/stripe-js @stripe/react-stripe-js
2. Create PaymentModal component with Stripe Elements
3. In workflow detail page, show PaymentModal when install returns clientSecret
4. Handle payment success → call /installations/:id/activate
5. Test end-to-end with Stripe test mode
close_reason: Implemented Stripe Elements checkout UI. Frontend now has PaymentForm component that renders when backend returns clientSecret for paid workflows. Payment success triggers installation activation.

title: Fix header Sign Up button to link to /auth/signup
Ensure technical accuracy against current implementation
neomutt-setup: Add email workflow integration patterns
Add MergeQueue class for concurrent commits - Phase 1 GAS TOWN
description: Enable 2-4 parallel workers by implementing merge queue. Validates commits before merge, resolves conflicts automatically where possible. See docs/GASTOWN_EVALUATION.md Phase 1.
close_reason:
Verified: MergeQueue class fully implemented in commit 39b3f94. All success criteria met:
- ✅ Validates commits before merge (requestMerge method)
- ✅ Detects conflicts (detectConflicts, validateAgainstMerging)
- ✅ Auto-resolves non-conflicting changes (FIFO queue, autoMergeable flag)
- ✅ TypeScript types clean (MergeRequest, MergeResult, MergeQueueState)
- ✅ All 18 tests passing
- ✅ Git integration (canMerge, performMerge, getModifiedFiles)
- ✅ Coordinator integration via exports in index.ts
- ✅ Enables 2-4 parallel workers (GAS TOWN Refinery pattern)

title: Error Repair Agent - autonomous error diagnosis and fix
description: Autonomous error repair pipeline: Error → Queue → Agent → PR → Approval → Deploy. See specs/error-repair-agent.yaml for full architecture. Components: error-receiver worker, repair-queue, repair-orchestrator DO, repair-agent workflow.

title: Extract Coordinator from runner.ts - Phase 1 GAS TOWN
